Hey all,
I have to send an email from my system to a groups of contacts. I created groups of contacts using *Create a new contact list API.* Now i want to send and email of profile percentage and reach out to 100% profile to all different groups of contacts as per there profile completion percentage. How can i send automated email to all groups of contacts using dashboard. Please suggest me a steps to sent an automated email to groups of contacts.
Thanks in advanced. :slightly_smiling_face:
